typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		DeptID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> hydsource
source(output(
		EID as string,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as string,
		EAddress as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		DeptID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> punesource
hydsource, punesource union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(insert_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MergeEmp.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		EID,
		EName,
		ESalary,
		EAddress,
		ModifiedDate,
		DeptID,
		insert_date
	)) ~> sink1
